findings.Liver: Limited views of the hepatic parenchyma are unremarkable. No focal liver lesions seen.
findings.Bile Ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation. CBD measures 4 mm.
findings.Gallbladder: Gallbladder is distended and contains sludge with a shadowing stone seen at the gallbladder neck. Mild gallbladder wall edema along the perihepatic portion and trace pericholecystic fluid in this region.
findings.Pancreas: Pancreatic head is normal. Body and tail not well evaluated.
